summary: MissDezLyn: 1.5 scale  Giant  Mage/Melee follower with dragonsbreathshouts.
descriptionHtml:
1.5 scale. lil smaller than a giant a lil bit bigger than a troll. MissDezLyn and DezLyn is made  from Aranea Ienith. They can be found at the Shrine of Azura, near Winterhold. Avoids death, cannot die. Level 50, max 80 and will level with you. They are carrying 5000 gold. Works well with all body/armor mods. She is in route from Riverwood. Waiting One Hr if on location found at Shine.  DeadlyAim, MissDezLyn perks carried DualSavagery ,Torch Bash, FifhtingStance, BoneBraker ,SkullCrusher,  Barbarrar, Critical Charge.  Critical Shout,   If you do enjoy any mods on Skyrim Nexus please don't for get to endorse. t.y. and BigSmiles.


  [b][i][u]Lave/ re  (This update should overwrite MissDezLyn's file. Remember to trade all objects back to your self befor up dateing MissDesolation).[/u][/i][/b]
MissDezLyn's Desolation's updated, level 80, max @ 150, Conjore Dremora Lord, Incinerate, perks Destruction Master 75 and 100 , Disintegrate, Intense flames., Dragon frost breathshout, Dragon fire breathshout and is now up to date. MissDezLyn is now Just one with all the perks and spells from both files put to gather. p.s. I tore town after town with this one, lol. hope you enjoy. This file is now finished. 

http;//steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198120548710/screenshots. and BigSmiles.

p.s. Don't forget to listen to Dubstep music.
author: Contrastsensitivity
